{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
event = Event(body=json.dumps(
  {"user":'nic1', 'phone': '+66816684442', 'pw': '12345678', 'name':'nic'}
    )).to_dict()
print(event)
add(event)

{'body': '{"user":"nic1","phone":"+66816684442","pw":"12345678","name":"nic"}', 'headers': {}, 'statusCode': 200}

{'body': '{"success":true}', 'statusCode': 200, 'headers': {}}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
def confirm(event, *args):
  body = Event.parseBody(event)
  requiredColumns = ['user','code']
  if not all(key in body for key in requiredColumns):
    return Response.returnError(message = {'error', f'missing {requiredColumns}'})
  if not (result := cognito.confirm(**body))['success']:
    return Response.returnError(message = result)
  return Response.returnSuccess(body = result)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
event = Event(body=json.dumps(
  {"user":'nic1', 'code': '806784'}
    )).to_dict()
print(event)
confirm(event)

{'body': '{"user":"nic1","code":"806784"}', 'headers': {}, 'statusCode': 200}

{'body': '{"success":true}', 'statusCode': 200, 'headers': {}}
